node.text: Yup! Hop into my online course, Heart-Centered Classroom Management and you’ll learn my three step system to a classroom that is INTENTIONAL about giving students what they need. ❤️ Doors close Sunday, July 18th and will not open until 2022! 💘 Hope to see you inside! #classroommanagement #backtoschoolwithheart #heartcentered #professionaldevelopment #teachersofig #kajabihero #teachergram

node.text: This is the LAST launch of the 2021 year of the Heart-Centered Classroom Management course! It has been my absolute honor to work alongside educators across the world in transforming their classrooms into heart-centered spaces. 💘🥲 I hope you’ll join me! Let me know if you need the link to join us! #professionaldevelopment #classroommanagement #backtoschoolwithheart #heartcentered #wellbeingforkids #socialemotionallearning #socialemotionaldevelopment #ittakesavillage #childhoodwonders #classroomsetup #teachersofinstagram #teachergram

node.text: Doors to my online course, The Heart-Centered Classroom Management Method are OPEN for enrollment! In this program, you’ll learn my 3 step system to implementing a classroom management structure rooted in social-emotional learning! 💘🥲🤗 Let me know if you need the link to enroll below! 💖💘👇🏼 #backtoschoolwithheart #heartcentered #wholechildeducation #wholechildapproach #healthykids #classroommanagement #professionaldevelopment #educationmatters #teachergram #teachersofinstagram #teachersfollowteachers

node.text:
The Classroom Systems mini-course is designed with ALL teachers in mind! It’s especially right for you if you believe your classroom is an extension of YOU and is the perfect place to build relationships. This is part of The Heart-Centered Teacher program suite, after all. It’s all about those connections! 

Don’t forget, enrollment ends tomorrow night! Let’s get you in!

#teachersfollowteachers #teachersofinstagram #classroommanagement #professionaldevelopment #Primaryteacher #secondaryteacher #newteacher #studentteacher #firstyearteacher

node.text:
You’re just one weekend away from a more simple, efficient, and connected classroom!

Doors to the Classroom Systems Weekend Makeover mini-course are open NOW! This will be the perfect summertime professional development for you (once you’ve rested and enjoyed some summer🤩)! 

Enroll today and gain lifetime access! That’s right, you can work through this mini-course in July next to your pool or in august right before school start! Either way, it’s yours for life! Link to enroll is in my profile now💖🤗

#classroommanagement #professionaldevelopment #forteachers #teachersofinstagram #teachersfollowteachers #iteachtoo #heartcentered #classroomorganization #classroomdecor #classroomsetup #beginningoftheyear #teacherlife #teacherproblems #teachertips

node.text:
Would you believe me if I told you we could completely refresh your classroom- from the flow, to the systems, to the relationships... in just ONE weekend?! 

In this NEW mini-course, we will focus on three core areas: your classroom flow, your classroom organization, and the heart of your classroom! 💖

Let’s do this! One weekend! Link to enroll now is in my profile🥰 tag a teacher friend who would love to join you on our makeover journey! 👋🏼🥰 

#teachersofinstagram #professionaldevelopment #kajabihero #teachersfollowteachers #iteachtoo #iteachk #firstyearteacher #newteacher #classroommanagement #studentteacher

node.text: The Heart-Centered Classroom Management course is truly the gift that will keep on giving. You won’t just use this method to survive and THRIVE these last several weeks of school. You will revisit this method for all the school years to come. Doors are OPEN! What are you waiting for?! Come join us in teaching the Heart-Centered way! #teachersofinstagram #teachersfollowteachers #teachersofig #classroommanagement #professionaldevelopment #heartcentered

node.text:
For the teacher who thinks this school year is past saving... it’s not. When you implement The Heart-Centered Method, you are giving students the gift of a lifelong foundation in healthy relationship building (and a solid classroom management routine at the same time)! 
Link is in my profile to enroll now and unlock lifetime access to the course as well as future updates FREE! 💖 #teachersofinstagram #teachersfollowteachers #teacherappreciation #teachersofig #professionaldevelopment #classroommanagement #heartcentered #wholechildeducation #socialemotionalhealth

node.text:
The Heart-Centered Teachers Membership is now OPEN to my Heart-Centered teacher students!😭🥰 I wanted to provide you with SUPPORT, COMMUNITY, and ACCOUNTABILITY in your implementation of the Heart-Centered Method! 💖 

Also, no FOMO necessary! 😆 
I decided to FLASH OPEN the course so get in now if you want to join the membership and gain access to monthly video trainings, mentor text ideas, done-for-you activities and songs ALL focused on our theme of the month! 💖🥰

node.text:
Picture this: a classroom where ALL students demonstrate that they feel part of an amazing community. A classroom where despite having an unusual start, crazy schedules, and new protocols, YOU are managing to create an exemplary classroom community. Remember: this community CANNOT happen by chance. This is Heart-Centered teaching. Connecting, rewarding, repairing. I hope you’ll join me before doors close tomorrow. Enroll now with the link in my profile❤️
#classroommanagement #iteachtoo #professionaldevelopment #ittakesheart #heartcentered #emotionalhealth #socialemotionaldevelopment #happykids #happyclassrooms #teachersfollowteachers #teachersofig

node.text:
In tonight’s LIVE we talked about hitting the reset button by facilitating check-ins, reviewing routines and procedures, and building our classroom community through songs! Here’s the ULTIMATE tip: once you implement the three step system in Heart-Centered Classroom Management (Connect, Reward, Repair) you’ll be doing this work ALL the time. Head to the link in my profile to enroll now! Course doors close Sunday at midnight! Hope to see you inside❤️
#teachersfollowteachers #teachersofig #teachersofinstagram #happyteachers #happykids #iteachtoo #instateacher #teacherblogger #classroomcommunity #classroommanagement #socialemotionaldevelopment

node.text:
I’m here to help you make the best decision about how to kickstart your new school year!

The FLASH OPEN for my course: Heart-Centered Classroom Management is closing soon! 

This course is my literal heart and soul and knowing how many classrooms around the world it has transformed makes me emotional.

Thank you for being a friend and for following along. Whether or not you’re on the Heart-Centered team yet, you play a big role in this journey. ❤️ 

Comment below 👇🏼 “I want in” if you’d like the link to join now! I’m going to share it out this as much as I can before doors close! Tag a friend who wouldn’t want to miss out! ❤️

#Teachersfollowteachers #teachersofig #teachergram #teachertraining #heartcentered #classroommanagement #socialemotionallearning #teachertribe #kajabihero #happyclassrooms #happyteacher #happykids #teacherlife #lifeofateacher #elementaryteacher #secondaryteacher #primaryteacher #iteachtoo

node.text:
This method has transformed classrooms around the world.

For years, I’ve shared with you bits and pieces of my classroom life and I received many questions about how I do what I do…

If you’ve been tuning in, you noticed I launched my Heart-Centered Teaching Method last month. Maybe you considered buying, but you weren’t sure. You wondered if you could handle one more thing this school year.

And then the cart closed, and you went back to planning for back to school... 
* Back to being exhausted.
* Back to being stretched thin.
* Back to wondering how to stay connected with kids through a mask or a screen.
* Back to trying the huge pressure of keeping everyone safe, but also feeling the push to squeeze in all the learning.
* Back to trying to decide what’s most important to fit in each day, knowing that it can’t all possibly fit.
 
If you know you can’t keep going on like this, and you know it’s time for a change...you have ONE LAST CHANCE to sneak inside my Heart-Centered Classroom Management Course.

A method that will transform your classroom into a Heart-Centered environment where everyone feels safe enough to make way for learning. 

So many times the next step is unclear, but this time it’s right in front of you. 

Comment below: “Me!” if you’d like the link to enroll!  Doors will NOT open again until next year (and I mean it)!😅🥰

node.text:
This is a note to your future teacher self.

Are you feeling in over your head?
Are you already dreading Monday?
Are you searching for a way to provide your students with extra love and support when they need it most?

This is why I wanted to give you ONE MORE CHANCE to enroll in the Heart-Centered Classroom Management System. 

Community doesn’t have to go on the back burner this year.
Social and emotional skills don’t have to be swept to the side.

In fact, it’s urgent that we make these skills a top priority now so that kids feel safe first and foremost. (Because when they feel safe...it’s like clearing the runway for academics.)

I want you to head into this school year with a plan. 3 steps to creating a powerful classroom management system that will carry you and your kids confidently through another challenging school year. 

Comment below 👇🏼 : “I’m in!” and I’ll send you the link to enroll now!  You’ve got 24 hours to make the best decision for your new school year, don’t miss out!

node.text:
The beginning of the school year is not easy.

You’ve got relationships to build, routines to teach, and lots of instruction to cover. 

This video is from the first week of school. It was our first lesson introducing reader’s workshop. I remember feeling nervous and overwhelmed before that first full day of school with my class. I remember not being sure where to start with my introduction of this lesson. 

And… that’s okay! 

When I watch this video, I don’t see all those anxious thoughts running through my head. I see a teacher and her students having fun. Don’t forget to HAVE FUN with your students. ❤️

Building a positive classroom community takes time and effort, but it is amazing what you can accomplish with your class as a result. Comment below if you’d like my FREE classroom community guide👇🏼 or tag a friend who would love this post! 🎊 Be sure to watch my feed tomorrow for an announcement you don’t want to miss! 🎉

#Teachersofinstagram #teachersofig #teachergram #teacherproblems #backtoschool #teaching #kindergartenteacher #happyteacher #happykids #reading #kindergartenrocks #classroommanagement #heartcentered #professionaldevelopment #teachertips #teachertraining #teacherssupportteachers #teachersrock #teacherappreciation #teachertribe

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Andriana | Classroom Community in Detroit, Michigan. May be an image of text that says 'Your classroom environment plays a role in helping students feel safe At the same time, it does not determine your teaching capabilities. THE ACTIVE EDUCATOR'.

node.text:
You could put me in a cardboard box and I would still make sure my students felt safe, seen, and heard!

Hear me out. 

My classroom environment has grown with me over the course of my teaching journey. My first handful of years teaching, I did not have a classroom aesthetic that was "on-trend" or full of popular store-bought items simply because I couldn't afford it or I was knee-deep in other beginning year teacher things.

I wanted to remind you of what I know to be true.

Yes, the classroom environment plays a role in helping students feel safe and it should absolutely be considered.
No, it doesn't solely determine your teaching capabilities.

The fact of the matter is this: I was still an amazing teacher before I could invest in my classroom space the way I wanted to.

And you are too!

No matter what season of your teaching journey you're currently in, you deserve to feel supported.  Let's give it up for ALL teachers and keep in mind that what matters most is the HEART in our classrooms. I know (I know) I may have some teachers say, yes but classroom design and decor supports that, and it does!  I just wanted to send some much needed support to teachers who might not have those opportunities right now.  You are all exactly what your students need, don't forget it.

#Teachersfollowteachers #teachersofig #teachergram #teachersbelike #happykids #happyteacher #teacherappreciation #teacherlife #teacherproblems #classroomsetup #classroomdecor #teacherssupportteachers #teachersofthegram #teachersofinstagram #newteacher #studentteacher #backtoschool

node.text:
All jokes aside… remember this: You cannot help your students regulate their emotions if you don't feel regulated yourself. 

Being an educator in today's world can feel downright impossible. We've got a lengthy list of responsibilities that seems to double each school year.  If you are feeling overwhelmed, defeated, and frustrated- I understand because I have been there! Every single one of those feelings is valid. 

Now this is where our job becomes that much more challenging.  No matter what it is we are feeling or experiencing, we need to 'be the calm' for our students.  Our students are not little adults, they can't be expected to behave and regulate as adults can/do.  Our students are learning how to connect, regulate, and make respectful and responsible choices.  They will absolutely make mistakes and it's our job to stay calm and in control of our own responses.

Tag a teacher friend below 👇🏼 who would love this post or let me know below if you'd like my FREE Classroom Community guide (this will definitely help you bring the calm in your classroom). 

#Teachersofinstagram #teachersfollowteachers #iteachk #kindergartenteacher #teacherproblems #teacherprobs #teachersbelike #teachertired #teacherlife #newteacher #betheexample #happyteacher #happykids #wellbeingforkids #mindfulnessmatters

Are you teaching letter names and sounds this school year?

Hop onto the Movement-Based Learning train because there is so much fun to be had when you pair movement and learning!

Here you’ll see one of our favorite letter names and sounds activities: our ACTIVE letter identification activities!  The best part about this resource is that you are targeting a variety of skills in ONE activity: counting/subitizing, letter identification and formation, AND movement!

You can find this bundle and all other ACTIVE resources in my TPT shop for up to 25% during the back-to-school TPT sale!  Tag a friend below 👇🏼 who would love to see this in-action video and let me know if you’d like the link!  Happy back to school shopping!

node.text:
If you don’t feel a little silly, you’re not doing it right!

And that’s on teaching your expectations the first weeks of school🤪☺️

It wasn’t until I moved down to Kindergarten that I realized how explicit I needed to be with teaching the “how to’s” and expectations to my Kindergarten students. In order to be successful for the entire school year, we’ve got to be thorough about EVERYTHING. 

Check out this video where I walk my students through how we can use our scissors safely, responsibly, and respectfully!

I’ve got a whole blog post for you outlining classroom expectations for a great year in K!  Let me know if you’d like the link or tag a friend to watch this video post below 👇🏼 !
